quotes.quote: Let that which stood in front go behind, let that which was behind advance to the front, let bigots, fools, unclean persons, offer new propositions, let the old propositions be postponed.
If you fall behind, run faster. Never give up, never surrender, and rise up against the odds.
Unless we move beyond what’s behind us, we cannot reach out to what lies in front of us.
Always try to see behind what you see because all you need to see can be only at the behind of the thing you see!
Be there for others, never leave yourself behind.
If you focus on what you left behind, you will never see what lies ahead.
What lies behind us and what lies ahead of us are tiny matters compared to what lives within us.
It is better to lead from behind and to put others in front, especially when you celebrate victory when nice things occur.
Behind all their personal vanity, women themselves always have an impersonal contempt for woman.
Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
